alert.note: Alert for Northeast Johnson County; Southeast Johnson County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 09 at 10:16AM MST until November 10 at 4:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 4 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Periods of snow, moderate at times. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches. * WHERE...Johnson County. * WHEN...From 3 PM this afternoon to 4 AM MST Thursday. The heaviest snow looks to occur between 6 PM and midnight. * IMPACTS...Roads will be become slick and hazardous. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Visibility in heavier snow will be under a half mile.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Northeast Johnson County; Southeast Johnson County
